author: kskovpen
body:
#### PR description:

Introduce an additional Run 3 wf where the HLT step is separated out from DIGI, following the studies mentioned in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37564

#### PR validation:

Tested on the newly created 11634.601. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

<!-- Please replace this text with any link to  -->

Not a backport.
title: Add wfs with HLT as separate step (refactor)
